name: SCHUMACHER HOMES OF CIRCLEVILLE, INC., petitioner, v. John SPENCER, et ux.
name_abbreviation: Schumacher Homes of Circleville, Inc. v. Spencer

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
SCHUMACHER HOMES OF CIRCLEVILLE, INC., petitioner,
v.
John SPENCER, et ux.
attorneys: Motion of Chamber of Commerce of the United States of America for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. On petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Appeals of West Virginia. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the Supreme Court of Appeals of West Virginia for further consideration in light of DIRECTV, Inc. v. Imburgia, 577 U.S. ----, 136 S.Ct. 463, 193 L.Ed.2d 365 (2015).
casebody.head_matter:
SCHUMACHER HOMES OF CIRCLEVILLE, INC., petitioner,
v.
John SPENCER, et ux.
No. 15-316.
Supreme Court of the United States
Feb. 29, 2016.
Motion of Chamber of Commerce of the United States of America for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. On petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Appeals of West Virginia. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the Supreme Court of Appeals of West Virginia for further consideration in light of DIRECTV, Inc. v. Imburgia, 577 U.S. ----, 136 S.Ct. 463, 193 L.Ed.2d 365 (2015).
